```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, fig.width=8, fig.height=4.5)

# Load packages
library(tidyverse)
```


### Load Data
```{r}
library(readr)
train <- read_csv("train.csv")
test <- read.csv("test.csv")
```

### Model
```{r}
mod <- lm(Survived ~ Sex + Age + Pclass, data=train)
summary(mod)

model <- glm(formula=Survived ~ Sex + Age + Pclass, data=train, family=binomial)
```

### Test the Model
```{r}
survived <- predict(mod, newdata=test, type = c("response", "terms"))

survived <- predict.glm(model, newdata=test, type = "response")

pred <- makeFun(mod)
test$Survived <- round(pred(test$Pclass))

sub <- test[,c(1,12)]

write_csv(sub,"submission.csv")
```
